resources.string:
Android version 1.1
Port by Fredrik Farnstrom
farnstrom@gmail.com
See Preferences screen for key bindings.
Touch the screen to scroll (if needed).
Use ? to access in-game help.
For more info on how to play the game, see www.nethack.org.
For source code and feedback about the Android port, see
http://code.google.com/p/nethack-android/
